welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kendall, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant cultural scene, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kendall has to offer during your visit!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tamiami Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Miami International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal dedicated to American Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal mainly serving international flights from non-American Airlines carriers.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: A concourse within the Central Terminal, serving international flights from American Airlines and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dade Collier Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is the largest terminal at FLL.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is used for domestic and international flights, and is connected to the parking garage.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to the airport's main hub airline.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login with an email address.
